snippet.title: DCS WORLD | 2022 AND BEYOND
snippet.description:
As the sun sets on this most challenging year for all, we look back fondly on what has been accomplished thanks to your passion and support. Our whole team, partners and friends are so grateful to you and our community for everything you have done to support us.

2022 is set to be another exciting year for DCS World, and we hope you enjoy this look into some of the items we have in store.

Onwards and Upwards! With all our gratitude. Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to you and your families.

Yours sincerely, 

Eagle Dynamics Team

DCS World 
https://www.digitalcombatsimulator.com/en/shop/
